name: Growing Alice
description:
Yo, it's actually a web game! Please use Chrome (or any Chromium-based browser) on PC if you can. Firefox should also work.

Despite having a mobile aspect ratio, this game isn't the best experience on mobile - it should be okay on Android but on iOS it fails to fill the screen. Okay, well, it works in Samsung Internet, which is what I use. Other browsers have wildly varying results. Thanks, login94.

Keys

There's no touchscreen equivalent for any of these functions.

  • Full screen
  • Imperial units
  • Reset the current run
  • Mute the sound
Achievements

I want to make a jam collection thing at some point, and it'll have some achievements. Here's a few I've thought of that can apply to this game. There's no implementation of an achievement system in this jam submission, so you'll have to keep track of these things yourself if you care about them!

  • 1km of Alice: Achieve a score of at least 1000m.
  • 100 Bowls of Stew on the Wall: Finish a game after collecting exactly 100 bowls of stew.
  • Single Carriageway Growth: Hit 60mph (27m/s).
Sources

Here are the things this game uses:

  • Soup Stew Beans, Night Sky Galaxy Space, Noto Emoji U+1F407
  • Alice in Wonderland Font
  • 7 eating crunches, Swish
  • libGDX, gdx-freetype-gwt, shapedrawer
  • I drew Alice and I'm very proud of this fact.
